definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
within the borders/internal (to a country, province, city etc)/domestic
domestic and international/at home and abroad
Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Inner Mongolia autonomous region

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 過去的半個世紀內，美國一直是世界的麪包籃子。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察小鼠舌下腺內神經肽的分佈。

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中對心壁內這種細胞的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: There's no reason to expect yourself to know everything in a month or two.
sentences.chinese: 沒理由期望你自己在一到兩個月內知道每件事。

sentences.english: All patients were treated with anterior interbody fusion and internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者爲前路植骨融合加內固定術。

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 將集團內的不良業務剔除，好過爲了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地區內的扶輪社在社員發展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: Within three years he accumulated great wealth by speculations in stocks.
sentences.chinese: 三年內他靠炒買股票積聚了大量財富。

sentences.english: Fenders will be ready in 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 防碰墊將在20分鐘內準備好。

sentences.english: Allthe rails width adjustment are quickly, easily accessible accessible acrossible across the entire width of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 在調幅範圍內，迅速靈活調整全機軌道寬窄。

sentences.english: The inclusion of any link to other websites does not imply endorsement by the Nestlé Group.
sentences.chinese: 將其他網站置於連結內不代表雀巢集團對其認可。

sentences.english: Nokia said the N8 would be widely available in coming weeks."The
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞稱，N8將在未來幾周內得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: Only 8 of the 58 present at the uncovering of the tomb died within a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 58人中只有8人在挖墓後的十幾年內死亡。

sentences.english: The state of our inner-city schools is a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 我們內城區學校的狀況就是一個恰當的例子。

sentences.english: At the mean time, the vulture went by. The potion was polluted by the unexpectedly fallen hair.
sentences.chinese: 同時，禿鷹正巧經過，禿鷹的頭髮無意間落入魔藥內。

sentences.english: Do not clutter up the page with so many illustrations that you obscure the message.
sentences.chinese: 不要在一頁內放置過多的插圖，那樣會模糊訊息。

definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
